items.name: Neat Linen/Cotton Jacket
items.description: Simple, throw-on, soft jacket in a washed linen/cotton twill. Asymmetric three button fastening at front - horn buttons. Two patch pockets. Unlined.

items.name: Classic Stripe Tee
items.description: Breton tee in a warm, soft cotton jersey. Boat-ish neck with 3/4 length sleeves. Split hem.

items.name: Brigitte Wooden  Sunglasses
items.description: Very chic, 60s-style wooden sunglasses with 100% UV protection lenses. Sustainable kosso wood frame coated with a water-based, non-allergenic paint. Handmade in France.

items.name: Boxy Stripe Hemp Jacket
items.description: Chic, short jacket in a textured, supple, striped hemp - rather like an antique linen. Neat and boxy with bracelet length sleeves. Corozo buttons, concealed beneath placket. Two patch pockets. Inverted box pleat into back yoke.

items.name: Denim Pleat Front Trouser
items.description: Pleat-front trouser in supple, real indigo-dyed denim. Slightly low rise. Two slip-in pockets. Two back, jean-style pockets. Zip fly with extended tab and metal button fastening. Look particularly good rolled up.

items.name: Leather Espadrille
items.description: Simplest, easy, suede summer shoe. Rope sole with rubber base. Soft leather lining, unlined heelpiece. These sandals come up slightly small; if you are in between sizes choose a size up.

items.name: Linen Knit Pullover
items.description: Neat-ish pullover with three-quarter-length raglan sleeves in an medium-weight, Italian-spun, dry linen knit. Ribbed neck, cuffs and stepped hem.

items.name: Hemp Apron Dress
items.description: Apron dress, lightly fitted at the waist with a neat A-line skirt, in a weighty hemp - rather like an antique linen. Two lined patch pockets. Square-ish neckline. Shoulder straps fasten to back of skirt with buttons - can be adjusted for length. Three button fastening at back of skirt. All corozo buttons.

items.name: Cotton Sateen Trouser
items.description: Full, tapered leg, pleat front trouser in smooth, slightly sheeny, cotton sateen. Zip fly with hook and bar fastening. Angled pockets. Jetted, buttoned back pockets. With a small tuck in the hem.

items.name: Plaited Belt
items.description: Crossover plaited belt in Italian, vegetable tanned bridle leather. Cut on a curve, intended to be worn with dresses, tunics or as you will. Hand made in London by a small, family run business.

items.name: Ajrakh Print Tunic
items.description: Collarless tunic top in a crisp, soft, printed cotton - the design based on a traditional Indian pattern. Kaftan-opening. Bib with contrasting print. Bracelet-length sleeves - self covered button and rouleau loop to fasten. Small gathers into back yoke.

items.name: Linen/Cotton Trouser
items.description: Cropped, pleat front trouser in a slightly slubby, weighty linen/cotton. Tapered leg. Two angled pockets. Welt pockets at back with two corozo buttons. Hook and bar fastening with zip fly.

items.name: Cashmere/Wool Cardigan
items.description: Draped, square-cut cardigan in a featherweight, soft and lofty cashmere/wool. Quite boxy and loosely fitting in the body with dropped shoulders and long, cosy sleeves. Finely ribbed neck, button placket and cuffs. Two patch pockets. Corozo buttons.

items.name: Minimal Rucksack
items.description: Simplest, cleverly designed rucksack hand made by chrisvanveghel in Amsterdam. The rope tie and straps can be adjusted to make a tote bag. Rustic leather and soft, chunky rope. Unlined. Internal keychain.

items.name: Abstract Floral Print Skirt
items.description: Very pretty, full pleated skirt in a smooth, printed cotton sateen. Neat slim waistband. Concealed side zip. To be worn resting lightly on the hips.

items.name: Linen Long Sleeve Tee
items.description: Easy fitting, quite boxy tee with dropped shoulders and bracelet-length sleeves in a slubby linen jersey.

items.name: Abstract Floral Print Dress
items.description: Printed cotton sateen dress with gently fitted body and flared, full and swingy skirt. Wide, boat-ish neck faced in self fabric. Below elbow-length sleeves. Concealed zip at back. Two in-seam pockets.

items.name: Cross Over Heeled Sandal
items.description: Hand made wood heel sandal from Chie Mihara with suede straps, crossing over at front, and contrast colour leather ankle straps. Brass buckles. This style is unique to TOAST.

items.name: Cotton Twill Shirt Dress
items.description: Worker's shirt dress in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Corozo buttons, the top three button showing, those below concealed. Bracelet length sleeves with double button fastening at cuff. Straight in the body with box pleat into back yoke. Jean patch pocket and two in-seam pockets. Split hem. All buttons are corozo with shank buttons at opening.

items.name: Denim Pinafore Dress
items.description: Structured, neatly fitting pinafore dress in a soft and supple, slightly lighter weight, indigo-dyed denim with 2% stretch - washed to a lighter shade of indigo. Slim waistband with belt loops. Two deep carpenter pockets at front. Straps at back and two patch pockets. Concealed metal zip at side. Facings in coral or white cotton.

items.name: Varca Sandal
items.description: Open toe slingback sandal in soft, waxed, flat nubuck leather. Made and hand finished by a small family business in Spain. Leather sole with a non slip rubber base. Leather lined. These sandals come up slightly large, if you are in between sizes choose a size down.

items.name: Cotton Twill Dress
items.description: A-line, sleeveless dress in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Two large patch pockets. Exposed metal zip at back with grosgrain puller.

items.name: Space Dyed Linen Top
items.description: Easy, boxy top in a soft and supple, space dyed linen. Kaftan-opening with blanket stitch detail. Dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Split, stepped hem.

items.name: Woven Check Bag
items.description: Check tote bag with a contrasting gingham handle, made from woven polyester - packing neatly away into a little pouch. Being polyester it is very light and easy to look after.

items.name: Denim Shirt Dress
items.description: Shirt dress with large patch pocket in lovely and supple, real indigo-dyed, washed denim - washed for a lighter shade of indigo. Soft, neat collar. Corozo shank buttons. Double buttoned cuff. Split side seams. Box pleat into back yoke.

items.name: Cotton Twill Culotte
items.description: Pleat-front, wide leg culotte in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Fitting neatly at the waist and over the hips. Zip fly and button fastening. Belt loops. Two angled front pockets. Jetted back pockets.

items.name: Embroidered Batik Print Dress
items.description: Light, airy, generously cut, batik print cotton dress with a full, swingy, panelled skirt. Piped collar stand. Embroidered at neckline opening. Wide elbow-length sleeves. Contrast print at hem. Two in-seam pockets.

items.name: Noelle Cap Sleeve Dress
items.description: Easy, tulip-shaped, knee-length jersey dress with cap sleeves. Boat-ish neck at the front, scooped at the back to a four button opening. Two angled pockets in front seams. The washed indigo and black colourway are in a compact washed cotton jersey, the kingfisher is in a soft and weighty, slubby cotton jersey.

items.name: Linen Japanese Trouser
items.description: Pull-on Japanese trouser with easy, cropped wide legs, in a weighty, drapey, pin stripe linen. Wide waistband with ties and light pleats below. Very dropped rise. Two in-seam pockets.

items.name: Embroidered Batik Print Top
items.description: Batik printed top in light, airy cotton. Embroidered along button placket. Neat standing collar with ecru piping. Grown-on, elbow-length sleeves. Front yoke with two small pleats below.

items.name: Denim Dress
items.description: Collarless, slightly A-line dress in a weighty, sturdy but supple, indigo-dyed denim - washed to a slightly softer shade of indigo. Front opening with four corozo shank buttons. Pleat below placket and large box pleat into back yoke - giving a fullness to the shape. Two patch pockets and two in-seam pockets. Bracelet length sleeves with double button cuffs. Cotton facing at neck, cuffs and pockets - shown when the cuffs are worn rolled.

items.name: Lydia Dress
items.description: Easy, sleeveless, tulip-shaped, jersey dress. Boat-ish neck at the front, scooped at the back to a four button opening. Mid-length. Two angled pockets in front seams. The washed indigo and black colourway are in a compact washed cotton jersey, the kingfisher is in a soft and weighty, slubby cotton jersey.

items.name: Cotton Twill Shirt
items.description: Neatly fitting button-through shirt in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Neat collar. Long sleeves with two buttons at cuff. Curved hem, dropped lower at back. Patch pocket with twin needle stitching. Box pleat into back yoke. Mother of pearl buttons.

items.name: Denim Emmet Dress
items.description: Pinafore front dress in deep, indigo-dyed denim. Slanted patch pockets. Wide straps, crossing over at back. Large, asymmetric pleat at back. Concealed side zip.

items.name: Floral Woven Ikat Dress
items.description: Slightly A-line, generously cut dress in a textured, hand woven cotton ikat. Boat-ish neck. Grown-on cap sleeves. Panelled in the body with two pockets in front seams. Self-fabric tie.

items.name: Cotton & Leather Espadrille
items.description: Traditional Catalan espadrille. Fastens with a bow at the back of the ankle. Comfortable, cushioned leather insole. Rope sole with rubber base. These sandals come up slightly small; if you are in between sizes choose a size up.

items.name: Cotton Twill Dungaree
items.description: Dungarees in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Easy straight leg. Lots of pockets. Three button fastening at either hip. Metal fitments and adjustable straps. Faux-fly.

items.name: Hemp Tunic Dress
items.description: Gently A-line tunic dress in a heavy hemp - rather like an antique linen. Kaftan-opening with blanket stitch detail. Centre seam. Elbow-length sleeves. Two in-seam pockets. Pull-on.

items.name: Wide Brim Straw Hat
items.description: Chic, floppy, wide brimmed straw hat. Can be worn with or without plaited straw tie.

items.name: Emmet Dress
items.description: Apron dress in weighty, washed cotton twill. Slanted patch pockets. Wide straps, crossing over at back. Large, asymmetric pleat at back. Concealed side zip.

items.name: Cotton Twill Skirt
items.description: Slightly A-line, flattering button-through skirt in a weighty, slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Fitting neatly over the hips. Belt loops. Two carpenter pockets. Centre seam detail at back. Corozo buttons. Calf-length.

items.name: Denim Tunic
items.description: Neatly fitting, gently A-line tunic with gansey-style neck in supple and quite weighty, real indigo-dyed, washed denim - washed for a lighter shade of indigo. Two large patch pockets. Concealed metal zip with herringbone puller at back.

items.name: Cotton Sateen Dress
items.description: Sleeveless, lightly fitted and slightly A-line, long cotton sateen dress with two large and deep patch pockets. Round neck with dart detailing. Concealed zip.

items.name: Cord Tunic Dress
items.description: Collarless A-line tunic dress in a soft, light, needlecord. Four button opening, with pleat below. Two patch pockets. Two slip-in pockets. Bracelet length sleeves and double buttoned cuff. Box pleat into back yoke.

items.name: Indigo Herringbone Boyfriend Coat
items.description: Relaxed coat in real indigo-dyed, Japanese-woven, quite heavily textured herringbone cotton. Single breasted two horn button opening with and two large patch pockets. Cotton lined.

items.name: Geo Cross Back Swimsuit
items.description: Bather in good quality swimwear jersey. Wide halter neck straps crossing over at back. Gather detail on straps and below bust. Removable pads.

items.name: Cotton Twill Jacket
items.description: Straight-cut, workwear-derived jacket. Slightly peachy, garment-dyed cotton twill. Corozo buttons, the top three showing, those below concealed. Three patch pockets and one internal pocket. Neat collar.
